name: Role of Dice
description:
Role of Dice is a soulslike action game prototype where you are a dice. The number on the dice defines your role. And when you roll in combat,  then your role (class) changes. Submitted as part of the 2022 GMTK Game Jam. 

INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Make it to the end of the board! Watch out for the enemy! The red bar represents your health. Run out of health and you have to start over!
  • You can roll when you have full meter. You can overcharge your meter to see what your next role will be. 
  • You can charge meter over time, or by using Dice. Pick up Dice in the world, and then Consume them to instantly gain full meter. Consuming a dice while already at full meter will "reroll" your next role, so you will turn into the role represented to the right of the blue bar. 
  • You can store up to three dice. Picking up additional dice after the third will automatically consume it.
  • If you try to roll without meter, but you have a dice, you will roll and expend one of your dice.
  • Rolling also heals you!
  • Press ESC or Select to quit the game.

KNOWN ISSUES:

  • Paladin, Thief, and Lancer cannot attack right now.
  • Wizard's Lightning Bolt isn't working, but the animation is playing. 
  • Ranger's arrows don't have working textures. They do have hitboxes that damage the enemy, but the enemy can damage and treat as a part of the player. 
  • Gamepad Controls are not displayed, if using a gamepad. 
  • You can enter an infinite falling animation when performing certain actions on uneven ground. 
  • The overcharge icon is not always transparent and does not show overcharge progress.
  • Enemies sometimes deal no damage.
  • The roll comes out incredibly slowly and is missing invincibility-frames and doesn't travel far.
